resultsFromSelectedText.text: Results are from selected text only.

httpStatusCode400.text: Bad request. The server cannot or will not process the request due to an apparent client error (e.g., malformed request syntax, size too large, invalid request message framing, or deceptive request routing).

httpStatusCode401.text: Unauthorized. Authentication is required and has failed or has not yet been provided. The request was valid, but the server is refusing action. The user might not have the necessary permissions for a resource, or may need an account of some sort.

httpStatusCode403.text: Forbidden. The request was valid, but the server is refusing action. The user might not have the necessary permissions for a resource, or may need an account of some sort.

httpStatusCode404.text: Not found. The requested resource could not be found but may be available in the future. Subsequent requests by the client are permissible.

httpStatusCode405.text: Method not allowed. A request method is not supported for the requested resource; for example, a GET request on a form that requires data to be presented via POST, or a PUT request on a read-only resource.

httpStatusCode406.text: Not acceptable. The requested resource is capable of generating only content not acceptable according to the Accept headers sent in the request.

httpStatusCode408.text: Request timeout. Looks like the server is taking too long to respond, this can be caused by either poor network connectivity or an error with the server. Please try again in a while.

httpStatusCode415.text: Unsupported media type. The request entity has a media type which the server or resource does not support. For example, the client uploads an image as image/svg+xml, but the server requires that images use a different format.

httpStatusCode500.text: Internal server error. The server encountered an unexpected condition which prevented it from fulfilling the request.

httpStatusCode503.text: Service unavailable. The server is currently unavailable because it is overloaded or down for maintenance. 503 Service Unavailable Error is an indication that the server is still functioning properly, since it’s able to process the request and has opted to return the 503 response code.

connectionReset.text: Connection reset. Could not connect to server, this can be caused by either service is not running or service is not responding. Please try again in a while.

connectionTimeout.text: Connection timed out. Looks like the server is taking too long to respond, this can be caused by either poor network connectivity or an error with the server. Please try again in a while.

connectionRefused.text: Connection refused. There could be many reasons, but the most common are: The port is not open on the destination machine; The port is open on the destination machine, but its backlog of pending connections is full; A firewall between the client and server is blocking access (also check local firewalls).

resultsFromSelectedText.text: Results are from selected text only.

httpStatusCode400.text: Ungültige Anforderung. Der Server kann oder wird die Anfrage aufgrund eines offensichtlichen Clientfehlers nicht verarbeiten (z. B. fehlerhafte Anforderungssyntax, zu große Größe, ungültiges Nachrichten-Framing für Anforderungen oder betrügerisches Anforderungsrouting).

httpStatusCode401.text: Nicht autorisiert. Die Authentifizierung ist erforderlich und ist fehlgeschlagen oder wurde noch nicht bereitgestellt. Die Anfrage war gültig, aber der Server lehnt eine Aktion ab. Der User verfügt möglicherweise nicht über die erforderlichen Berechtigungen für eine Ressource oder benötigt ein Konto.

httpStatusCode403.text: Verboten. Die Anfrage war gültig, aber der Server lehnt eine Aktion ab. Der User verfügt möglicherweise nicht über die erforderlichen Berechtigungen für eine Ressource oder benötigt ein Konto.

httpStatusCode404.text: Nicht gefunden. Die angeforderte Ressource konnte nicht gefunden werden, ist aber möglicherweise in Zukunft verfügbar. Nachforderungen des Auftraggebers sind zulässig.

httpStatusCode405.text: Methode nicht erlaubt. Eine Anforderungsmethode wird für die angeforderte Ressource nicht unterstützt; B. eine GET-Anfrage in einem Formular, das die Präsentation von Daten per POST erfordert, oder eine PUT-Anfrage an eine schreibgeschützte Ressource.

httpStatusCode406.text: Inakzeptabel. Die angeforderte Ressource kann nur Inhalte generieren, die gemäß den in der Anforderung gesendeten Accept-Headern nicht zulässig sind.

httpStatusCode408.text: Zeitüberschreitung der Anforderung. Der Server hat eine Zeitüberschreitung beim Warten auf die Anforderung. Laut HTTP-Spezifikation: Der Client hat innerhalb der Wartezeit des Servers keine Anfrage gestellt Der Kunde KANN die Anfrage ohne Änderungen zu einem späteren Zeitpunkt wiederholen..

httpStatusCode415.text: Nicht unterstützter Medientyp. Die Anforderungsinstanz hat einen Medientyp, den der Server oder die Ressource nicht unterstützt. Der Client lädt beispielsweise ein Bild als Bild/svg+xml hoch, der Server erfordert jedoch, dass Bilder ein anderes Format verwenden.

httpStatusCode500.text: Interner Serverfehler. Der Server hat eine unerwartete Bedingung festgestellt, die ihn daran hinderte, die Anforderung zu erfüllen.

httpStatusCode503.text: Dienst nicht verfügbar. Der Server ist derzeit nicht verfügbar, da er überlastet oder wegen Wartungsarbeiten ausgefallen ist. Der Fehler 503 Service Unavailable ist ein Hinweis darauf, dass der Server noch ordnungsgemäß funktioniert, da er die Anfrage verarbeiten kann und sich dafür entschieden hat, den 503-Antwortcode zurückzugeben.

connectionReset.text: Verbindung zurücksetzen. Es konnte keine Verbindung zum Server hergestellt werden. Dies kann daran liegen, dass der Dienst nicht ausgeführt wird oder der Dienst nicht antwortet. Bitte versuchen Sie es in einer Weile erneut.

connectionTimeout.text: Zeitüberschreitung der Verbindung. Es sieht so aus, als ob der Server zu lange braucht, um zu antworten. Dies kann entweder durch eine schlechte Netzwerkverbindung oder einen Fehler mit dem Server verursacht werden. Bitte versuchen Sie es in einer Weile erneut.

connectionRefused.text: Verbindung abgelehnt. Es kann viele Gründe geben, aber die häufigsten sind: Der Port ist auf dem Zielcomputer nicht geöffnet. Der Port ist auf dem Zielcomputer geöffnet, aber sein Rückstand an ausstehenden Verbindungen ist voll. Eine Firewall zwischen Client und Server blockiert den Zugriff (überprüfen Sie auch lokale Firewalls).

httpStatusCode400.text: Bad request. The server cannot or will not process the request due to an apparent client error (e.g., malformed request syntax, size too large, invalid request message framing, or deceptive request routing).

httpStatusCode401.text: Unauthorized. Authentication is required and has failed or has not yet been provided. The request was valid, but the server is refusing action. The user might not have the necessary permissions for a resource, or may need an account of some sort.

httpStatusCode403.text: Forbidden. The request was valid, but the server is refusing action. The user might not have the necessary permissions for a resource, or may need an account of some sort.

httpStatusCode404.text: Not found. The requested resource could not be found but may be available in the future. Subsequent requests by the client are permissible.

httpStatusCode405.text: Method not allowed. A request method is not supported for the requested resource; for example, a GET request on a form that requires data to be presented via POST, or a PUT request on a read-only resource

httpStatusCode406.text: Not acceptable. The requested resource is capable of generating only content not acceptable according to the Accept headers sent in the request.

httpStatusCode408.text: Request timeout. The server timed out waiting for the request. According to HTTP specifications: The client did not produce a request within the time that the server was prepared to wait. The client MAY repeat the request without modifications at any later time.

httpStatusCode415.text: Unsupported media type. The request entity has a media type which the server or resource does not support. For example, the client uploads an image as image/svg+xml, but the server requires that images use a different format.

httpStatusCode500.text: Internal server error. The server encountered an unexpected condition which prevented it from fulfilling the request.

httpStatusCode503.text: Service unavailable. The server is currently unavailable because it is overloaded or down for maintenance. 503 Service Unavailable Error is an indication that the server is still functioning properly, since it’s able to process the request and has opted to return the 503 response code.

connectionReset.text: Connection reset. Could not connect to server, this can be caused by either service is not running or service is not responding. Please try again in a while.

connectionTimeout.text: Connection timed out. Looks like the server is taking to long to respond, this can be caused by either poor network connectivity or an error with the server. Please try again in a while.

connectionRefused.text: Connection refused. There could be many reasons, but the most common are, The port is not open on the destination machine. The port is open on the destination machine, but its backlog of pending connections is full. A firewall between the client and server is blocking access (also check local firewalls).

httpStatusCode400.text: Bad request. The server cannot or will not process the request due to an apparent client error (e.g., malformed request syntax, size too large, invalid request message framing, or deceptive request routing).

httpStatusCode401.text: Unauthorized. Authentication is required and has failed or has not yet been provided. The request was valid, but the server is refusing action. The user might not have the necessary permissions for a resource, or may need an account of some sort.

httpStatusCode403.text: Forbidden. The request was valid, but the server is refusing action. The user might not have the necessary permissions for a resource, or may need an account of some sort.

httpStatusCode404.text: Not found. The requested resource could not be found but may be available in the future. Subsequent requests by the client are permissible.

httpStatusCode405.text: Method not allowed. A request method is not supported for the requested resource; for example, a GET request on a form that requires data to be presented via POST, or a PUT request on a read-only resource

httpStatusCode406.text: Not acceptable. The requested resource is capable of generating only content not acceptable according to the Accept headers sent in the request.

httpStatusCode408.text: Request timeout. The server timed out waiting for the request. According to HTTP specifications: The client did not produce a request within the time that the server was prepared to wait. The client MAY repeat the request without modifications at any later time.

httpStatusCode415.text: Unsupported media type. The request entity has a media type which the server or resource does not support. For example, the client uploads an image as image/svg+xml, but the server requires that images use a different format.

httpStatusCode500.text: Internal server error. The server encountered an unexpected condition which prevented it from fulfilling the request.

httpStatusCode503.text: Service unavailable. The server is currently unavailable because it is overloaded or down for maintenance. 503 Service Unavailable Error is an indication that the server is still functioning properly, since it’s able to process the request and has opted to return the 503 response code.

connectionReset.text: Connection reset. Could not connect to server, this can be caused by either service is not running or service is not responding. Please try again in a while.

connectionTimeout.text: Connection timed out. Looks like the server is taking to long to respond, this can be caused by either poor network connectivity or an error with the server. Please try again in a while.

connectionRefused.text: Connection refused. There could be many reasons, but the most common are, The port is not open on the destination machine. The port is open on the destination machine, but its backlog of pending connections is full. A firewall between the client and server is blocking access (also check local firewalls).

emptyTextReadabilityErrorMsg.text: No se puede calcular la legibilidad de un texto vacío.

readingLevelCollegeGraduate.text: Graduado Universitario. Muy difícil de leer. Mejor entendido por graduados universitarios.

readingLevel10-12thGrade.text: 10<sup>th</sup> a 12<sup>th</sup> grado. Bastante difícil de leer.

readingLevel8-9thGrade.text: 8<sup>th</sup> y 9<sup>th</sup> grado. Inglés Claro. Fácilmente entendido por estudiantes de 13 a 15 años.

readingLevel6thGrade.text: 6<sup>th</sup> grado. Easy to read. Fácil de leer. Inglés Conversacional para consumidores.

readingLevel5thGrade.text: 5<sup>th</sup> grado. Bastante fácil de leer. Fácilmente entendido por un estudiante promedio de 11 años.

readingLevel30-40.text: Fácil de leer, ficción, periódicos populares

readingLevel50-60.text: Difícil, valor normal de textos oficiales

header.text: Su licencia de Lingofy ha caducado!

renewInfo.text: Pero no se preocupe. Para seguir utilizando Lingofy con todos sus datos intactos, simplemente renueve su licencia ahora.

noEmail.text: Por favor ingrese su dirección de correo electrónico.

invalidEmail.text: Por favor ingrese una dirección válida de correo electrónico.

loginFailedBody.text: Por favor vuelva a verificar su nombre de usuario y contraseña.

concurrentScanErrorMsg.text: No se permite solicitud de concurrente de Site Check.

statusMsgSendReportEmail.text: Informe de Site Check creado correctamente. Enviando ahora informe de Site Check a correo electrónico %EMAILADDRESS%

invalidUrl.text: Por favor ingrese un URL válido

invalidUrlDomain.text: El url tiene que coincidir con el dominio del correo electrónico

noEmail.text: Por favor ingrese su correo electrónico.

licenseViolationMissingOrInvalid.text: No se pudo encontrar una licencia válida de Site Check de Lingofy.

successMsg.text: El informe de Site Check ha sido enviado a su correo electrónico

maxCharsLimitReachedErrorMsg.text: Número máximo de caracteres alcanzado(%MAXCHARSLIMIT%). Abandonando escaneo.

emailMsg.text: Por favor encuentre el %SHORTSYSTEMNAME% informe de corrección para el URL proporcionado %URL%.

timeLimitErrorMsg.text: El url proporcionado ya ha sido escaneado. El mismo url puede ser escaneado después de 24 horas. Por favor reintente otra vez después de %REMAININGTIME% horas.

didYouMeanAlternatives.text: Quisiste decir alguna de estas alternativas:

couldNotConnect.text: No pudo conectarse con el %SHORTSYSTEMNAME% Server.

setAddress.text: Ingresar o elegir el nombre de un servidor o una dirección IP

okToReconnect.text: Haga clic en OK para reactivar %PREV_SERVER%.

setUsername.text: Elija un usuario de %SHORTSYSTEMNAME% para su autentificación

setLicenseKey.text: Ingrese clave de licencia de su compañía

emailNotRegistered.text: El dominio de su correo electrónico no se ha registrado con %SHORTSYSTEMNAME%.

serverSetAndLicenseKeySend.text: La dirección del servidor está configurada y la clave de licencia ha sido enviada a su dirección de correo electrónico.

setUserName.text: Su nombre de usuario es diferente de su dirección de correo electrónico (opcional)

enterPasscode.text: Por favor ingrese la contraseña temporal que se envió a su correo electrónico %email%.

passcodeExpired.text: Esta contraseña ha expirado. Se ha enviado una nueva contraseña temporal a %email%.

emailOrUserNameRequired.text: Es necesario introducir un correo electrónico o nombre de usuario.

licenseKeyRequired.text: Se necesita una clave de licencia.

httpStatusCode400.text: Solicitud incorrecta. El servidor no puede o no procesará la solicitud debido a un aparente error del cliente (por ejemplo, sintaxis de solicitud con formato incorrecto, tamaño demasiado extenso, enmarcado de mensaje de solicitud no válido o enrutamiento de solicitud engañoso).

httpStatusCode401.text: No autorizado. Se requiere autenticación porque ha fallado o no ha sido proporcionada todavía. La solicitud fue válida pero el servidor rechaza la acción. Es posible que el usuario no tenga los permisos necesarios para un recurso, o pueda necesitar algún tipo de cuenta.

httpStatusCode403.text: Prohibido. La solicitud fue válida pero el servidor rechaza la acción. Es posible que el usuario no tenga los permisos necesarios para un recurso, o pueda necesitar algún tipo de cuenta.

httpStatusCode404.text: No encontrado. No se pudo encontrar el recurso solicitado, pero puede estar disponible en el futuro. Se permiten solicitudes posteriores por parte del cliente.

httpStatusCode405.text: Método no permitido. No se admite un método de solicitud para el recurso solicitado; por ejemplo, una petición GET en un formulario que requiere que se presenten datos a través de POST, o una petición PUT en un recurso de sólo lectura.

httpStatusCode406.text: Inaceptable. El recurso solicitado es capaz de generar solamente contenido no aceptable de acuerdo con los encabezados de Aceptar enviados en la solicitud.

httpStatusCode408.text: Solicitud vencida. El servidor declinó procesar solicitud al excederse tiempo de espera. De acuerdo con las especificaciones HTTP: El cliente no efectuó ninguna solicitud dentro del tiempo normal de espera del servidor. El cliente PUEDE realizar la misma solicitud sin modificaciones posteriormente.

httpStatusCode415.text: Tipo de medio no compatible. La entidad de solicitud tiene un tipo de medio que el servidor o el recurso no admite. Por ejemplo, el cliente carga una imagen como image/svg+xml, pero el servidor requiere que las imágenes usen un formato diferente.

httpStatusCode500.text: Error de servidor interno. El servidor encontró una condición inesperada que le impidió cumplir con la solicitud.

httpStatusCode503.text: Servicio no disponible. El servidor no se encuentra disponible en este momento porque está sobrecargado o está fuera de servicio por mantenimiento. El Error de Servicio No Disponible 503 es una indicación de que el servidor todavía funciona correctamente, ya que puede procesar la solicitud y ha optado por devolver el código de respuesta 503.

connectionReset.text: Reajuste de conexión. No se pudo conectar con el servidor, esto puede deberse a que el servicio no se está ejecutando o el servicio no responde. Por favor intente nuevamente más tarde.

connectionTimeout.text: Tiempo de conexión agotado. Parece que el servidor tarda mucho en responder, esto puede ser causado por una conectividad de red deficiente o un error en el servidor. Por favor intente nuevamente más tarde.

connectionRefused.text: Conexión denegada. Puede haber muchas razones, pero las más comunes son: el puerto no está abierto en la máquina de destino. El puerto está abierto en la máquina de destino, pero su reserva de conexiones pendientes está llena. Un contrafuegos entre el cliente y el servidor está bloqueando el acceso (también verifique los contrafuegos locales).

httpStatusCode400.text: Bad request. The server cannot or will not process the request due to an apparent client error (e.g., malformed request syntax, size too large, invalid request message framing, or deceptive request routing).

httpStatusCode401.text: Unauthorized. Authentication is required and has failed or has not yet been provided. The request was valid, but the server is refusing action. The user might not have the necessary permissions for a resource, or may need an account of some sort.

httpStatusCode403.text: Forbidden. The request was valid, but the server is refusing action. The user might not have the necessary permissions for a resource, or may need an account of some sort.

httpStatusCode404.text: Not found. The requested resource could not be found but may be available in the future. Subsequent requests by the client are permissible.

httpStatusCode405.text: Method not allowed. A request method is not supported for the requested resource; for example, a GET request on a form that requires data to be presented via POST, or a PUT request on a read-only resource

httpStatusCode406.text: Not acceptable. The requested resource is capable of generating only content not acceptable according to the Accept headers sent in the request.

httpStatusCode408.text: Request timeout. The server timed out waiting for the request. According to HTTP specifications: The client did not produce a request within the time that the server was prepared to wait. The client MAY repeat the request without modifications at any later time.

httpStatusCode415.text: Unsupported media type. The request entity has a media type which the server or resource does not support. For example, the client uploads an image as image/svg+xml, but the server requires that images use a different format.

httpStatusCode500.text: Internal server error. The server encountered an unexpected condition which prevented it from fulfilling the request.

httpStatusCode503.text: Service unavailable. The server is currently unavailable because it is overloaded or down for maintenance. 503 Service Unavailable Error is an indication that the server is still functioning properly, since it’s able to process the request and has opted to return the 503 response code.

connectionReset.text: Connection reset. Could not connect to server, this can be caused by either service is not running or service is not responding. Please try again in a while.

connectionTimeout.text: Connection timed out. Looks like the server is taking to long to respond, this can be caused by either poor network connectivity or an error with the server. Please try again in a while.

connectionRefused.text: Connection refused. There could be many reasons, but the most common are, The port is not open on the destination machine. The port is open on the destination machine, but its backlog of pending connections is full. A firewall between the client and server is blocking access (also check local firewalls).

For å aktivere %SHORTSYSTEMNAME% på denne siden, følg disse stegene. 1. Klikk på ikonet som ser ut som et skjold i adresselinjen. 2. I dialogboksen til ikonet, klikk på 'Last inn utrygge skripter'. 3. Når siden er lastet på nytt, kan du bruke %SHORTSYSTEMNAME%.

resultsFromSelectedText.text: Results are from selected text only.

httpStatusCode400.text: Bad request. The server cannot or will not process the request due to an apparent client error (e.g., malformed request syntax, size too large, invalid request message framing, or deceptive request routing).

httpStatusCode401.text: Unauthorized. Authentication is required and has failed or has not yet been provided. The request was valid, but the server is refusing action. The user might not have the necessary permissions for a resource, or may need an account of some sort.

httpStatusCode403.text: Forbidden. The request was valid, but the server is refusing action. The user might not have the necessary permissions for a resource, or may need an account of some sort.

httpStatusCode404.text: Not found. The requested resource could not be found but may be available in the future. Subsequent requests by the client are permissible.

httpStatusCode405.text: Method not allowed. A request method is not supported for the requested resource; for example, a GET request on a form that requires data to be presented via POST, or a PUT request on a read-only resource

httpStatusCode406.text: Not acceptable. The requested resource is capable of generating only content not acceptable according to the Accept headers sent in the request.

httpStatusCode408.text: Request timeout. The server timed out waiting for the request. According to HTTP specifications: The client did not produce a request within the time that the server was prepared to wait. The client MAY repeat the request without modifications at any later time.

httpStatusCode415.text: Unsupported media type. The request entity has a media type which the server or resource does not support. For example, the client uploads an image as image/svg+xml, but the server requires that images use a different format.

httpStatusCode500.text: Internal server error. The server encountered an unexpected condition which prevented it from fulfilling the request.

httpStatusCode503.text: Service unavailable. The server is currently unavailable because it is overloaded or down for maintenance. 503 Service Unavailable Error is an indication that the server is still functioning properly, since it’s able to process the request and has opted to return the 503 response code.

connectionReset.text: Connection reset. Could not connect to server, this can be caused by either service is not running or service is not responding. Please try again in a while.

connectionTimeout.text: Connection timed out. Looks like the server is taking to long to respond, this can be caused by either poor network connectivity or an error with the server. Please try again in a while.

connectionRefused.text: Connection refused. There could be many reasons, but the most common are, The port is not open on the destination machine. The port is open on the destination machine, but its backlog of pending connections is full. A firewall between the client and server is blocking access (also check local firewalls).

httpUnsecureResourceLoadMsg.text: Aviso de Carregamento Inseguro . A página foi carregada pelo protocolo HTTPS (seguro), mas %SHORTSYSTEMNAME% está carregando pelo HTTP (inseguro). Para ativar %SHORTSYSTEMNAME% nesta página siga os seguintes passos. 1. Clique no ícone de alerta de proteção na barra de endereço. 2. Na caixa de diálogo do ícone, clique Carregar código não seguro/Carregar de qualquer modo. 3. Quando a página estiver carregada pode usar %SHORTSYSTEMNAME%.

licenseViolationTextTooLarge.text: The text is too large. The text cannot exceed %MAX% characters, but the submitted text comprise %COUNT% characters. Please select a smaller part of the text before running %SHORTSYSTEMNAME% again.

connectSuccessful.text: The connection to %SHORTSYSTEMNAME% Server is now established.

emptyCorrectSend.text: The Correct field cannot be empty!

docTextChangedMsg.text: The document text has changed. Do you want to run %SHORTSYSTEMNAME% proofing again on the new text?

noCorrectionSelectedMsg.text: Click Cancel to select the corrections you want applied. Click Accept to continue without applying any corrections.

officeJSAddinFindReplaceDialogOpenError.text: Please close the Find and Replace dialog and try again.

trialAccountSetUpMsg.text: Please wait while we set up your trial account ...

removeTagsMenuTooltip.text: Removes the text formatting tags inserted by %SHORTSYSTEMNAME%.

resultsFromSelectedText.text: Results are from selected text only.

httpStatusCode400.text: Bad request. The server cannot or will not process the request due to an apparent client error (e.g., malformed request syntax, size too large, invalid request message framing, or deceptive request routing).

httpStatusCode401.text: Unauthorized. Authentication is required and has failed or has not yet been provided. The request was valid, but the server is refusing action. The user might not have the necessary permissions for a resource, or may need an account of some sort.

httpStatusCode403.text: Forbidden. The request was valid, but the server is refusing action. The user might not have the necessary permissions for a resource, or may need an account of some sort.

httpStatusCode404.text: Not found. The requested resource could not be found but may be available in the future. Subsequent requests by the client are permissible.

httpStatusCode405.text: Method not allowed. A request method is not supported for the requested resource; for example, a GET request on a form that requires data to be presented via POST, or a PUT request on a read-only resource

httpStatusCode406.text: Not acceptable. The requested resource is capable of generating only content not acceptable according to the Accept headers sent in the request.

httpStatusCode408.text: Request timeout. The server timed out waiting for the request. According to HTTP specifications: The client did not produce a request within the time that the server was prepared to wait. The client MAY repeat the request without modifications at any later time.

httpStatusCode415.text: Unsupported media type. The request entity has a media type which the server or resource does not support. For example, the client uploads an image as image/svg+xml, but the server requires that images use a different format.

httpStatusCode500.text: Internal server error. The server encountered an unexpected condition which prevented it from fulfilling the request.

httpStatusCode503.text: Service unavailable. The server is currently unavailable because it is overloaded or down for maintenance. 503 Service Unavailable Error is an indication that the server is still functioning properly, since it’s able to process the request and has opted to return the 503 response code.

connectionReset.text: Connection reset. Could not connect to server, this can be caused by either service is not running or service is not responding. Please try again in a while.

connectionTimeout.text: Connection timed out. Looks like the server is taking to long to respond, this can be caused by either poor network connectivity or an error with the server. Please try again in a while.

connectionRefused.text: Connection refused. There could be many reasons, but the most common are, The port is not open on the destination machine. The port is open on the destination machine, but its backlog of pending connections is full. A firewall between the client and server is blocking access (also check local firewalls).

seeInfoPaneForRest.text: PLEASE SEE INFO PANE FOR THE REST OF THIS TEXT!

infoDeleteTooltip.text: Click to erase from your text

infoSynonymsDesc.text: (help to avoid repetition and add flavor)

acceptAndCheckNextBtnToolTipSingleCorrec.text: Accept %COUNT% correction and check next story

acceptAndCheckNextBtnToolTipMultipleCorr.text: Accept %COUNT% corrections and check next story

acceptBtnToolTipSingleAlternatives.text: One correction has multiple alternatives. Please select one of the alternatives for this correction.

acceptBtnToolTipMultipleAlternatives.text: %COUNT% corrections have multiple alternatives. Please select one of the alternatives for these corrections.

escapedTagsNote.text: Asterisks (*) indicate a coding tag in your copy.

emptyTextReadabilityErrorMsg.text: Can't measure the readability of empty text.

textReadingTimeInfoTooltip.text: Based on an average reading speed of %VALUE% words per minute.

textSpeakingTimeInfoTooltip.text: Based on an average speaking speed of %VALUE% words per minute.

readingLevelCollegeGraduate.text: College Graduate. Very difficult to read. Best understood by university graduates.

readingLevel10-12thGrade.text: 10<sup>th</sup> to 12<sup>th</sup> grade. Fairly difficult to read.

readingLevel8-9thGrade.text: 8<sup>th</sup> and 9<sup>th</sup> grade. Plain English. Easily understood by 13 to 15 year old students.

readingLevel6thGrade.text: 6<sup>th</sup> grade. Easy to read. Conversational English for consumers.

readingLevel5thGrade.text: 5<sup>th</sup> grade. Very easy to read. Easily understood by an average 11 year old student.

readingLevel0-30.text: Very easy to read, children's books

readingLevel30-40.text: Easy to read, fiction, popular newspapers

readingLevel50-60.text: Hard, normal value for official texts

renewInfo.text: But don't worry. To continue to use Lingofy with all your data intact, simply renew your license now.

emailMsg.text: Please see the attached %SHORTSYSTEMNAME% Site Check report for URL: %URL%.

timeLimitErrorMsg.text: The provided URL is already scanned. The same URL can be scanned after 24 hours. Please try again in %REMAININGTIME% hour(s).

didYouMeanAlternatives.text: Did you mean any of these alternatives:

serverURLCommentText.text: Default value provided for development only. For production, please set the correct URL. This value is unique to each deployment environment.

usernameCommentText.text: Use logged in user email address or username.

licenseKeyCommentText.text: Please set the correct licenseKey. This value is unique to each deployment environment.

showFloatingMenuCommentText.text: This will replace the %SHORTSYSTEMNAME% sidebar menu with a more traditional drop-down menu.

setAddress.text: Enter or select a server name or IP address

emailNotRegistered.text: Your email domain is not registered with %SHORTSYSTEMNAME%.

serverSetAndLicenseKeySend.text: Server address is set and license key has been sent to your email address.

enterPasscode.text: Please enter the one-time passcode from the email sent to %email%.

passcodeExpired.text: Entered code is expired. New code has been sent to your email address.

useEmailAsUsername.text: Use my email address as my username

httpUnsecureResourceLoadMsg.text: Load Insecure Content Warning. The page was loaded over HTTPS (secure), but %SHORTSYSTEMNAME% is loading over HTTP (insecure). To enable %SHORTSYSTEMNAME% on this page follow these steps. 1. Click the alert shield icon in the address bar. 2. In the icon dialog box, click 'Load unsafe script'. 3. When the page is reloaded you can use %SHORTSYSTEMNAME%.
